entry.title: Pygoat - Learn Django security the hard way
entry.summary:
Description

[EuroPython 2023 — Terrace 2B on 2023-07-21]

https://ep2023.europython.eu/session/pygoat-learn-django-security-the-hard-way

Learn to secure your Django apps by attacking (and then securing) Pygoat - An intentionally vulnerable Python Django application. Explore the OWASP top 10 vulnerabilities and understand how to mitigate them from Django apps.

This work is licensed …

Description

[EuroPython 2023 — Terrace 2B on 2023-07-21]

https://ep2023.europython.eu/session/pygoat-learn-django-security-the-hard-way

Learn to secure your Django apps by attacking (and then securing) Pygoat - An intentionally vulnerable Python Django application. Explore the OWASP top 10 vulnerabilities and understand how to mitigate them from Django apps.

entry.title: Building GraphQL microservices using FastAPI
entry.summary:
Description

FastAPI is a Python web framework built on top of the ASGI standard. The fusion of GraphQL and FastAPI emerges as a pivotal approach for constructing agile and scalable microservices. This talk delves into the symbiotic relationship between GraphQL's query flexibility and FastAPI's high-performance capabilities. Attendees will gain insights …
entry.content:
Description

FastAPI is a Python web framework built on top of the ASGI standard. The fusion of GraphQL and FastAPI emerges as a pivotal approach for constructing agile and scalable microservices. This talk delves into the symbiotic relationship between GraphQL's query flexibility and FastAPI's high-performance capabilities. Attendees will gain insights into seamless integration techniques, leveraging FastAPI's asynchronous framework, dependency injection, and GraphQL's expressive querying.
